column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Visiting Chicago for the first time with my husband for our 4th wedding anniversary. This was the first restaurant we visited there and I can't say enough about how delicious and authentic the food is!!! The servings are pretty big so we had a salmon Caesar salad
column3: mac and cheese and the shrimp scampi. My husband also had the best old fashioned ever
column5: our server. Emily was simply amazing! She was extremely patient and helpful
column6: and made sure that we enjoyed our experience. I highly recommend this place
column7: just make sure you leave enough room to eat because you will need it!!!
